Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Ribosome-inactivating protein momorcochin-S (rRNA N-glycosidase; Plant defense)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the ribosome-inactivating protein family (Type 1 RIP subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: Purification and properties of a new ribosome-inactivating protein with RNA N-glycosidase activity suitable for immunotoxin preparation from the seeds of Momordica cochinchinensis.
Literature.Author: Bolognesi A, Barbieri L, Carnicelli D, Abbondanza A, Cenini P, Falasca AI, Dinota A, Stirpe F.
